title: Global equity funds attract biggest inflow in five weeks as concerns around AI ease
description: Global equity funds received their strongest inflows in five weeks in the seven days to February 18, as easing concerns over artificial intelligence stocks and investor rotation into other sectors supported demand, while renewed hopes for Federal Reserve rate cuts lifted sentiment toward U.S. growth.
content: Feb 20 (Reuters) - Global equity funds received their strongest inflows in five weeks in the seven days to February 18, as easing concerns over artificial intelligence stocks and investor rotation into other sectors supported demand, while renewed ho... [1928 chars]

title: From Miami to New Delhi: U.S. AI Guru Dr. Ravi Singh Unveils Magenta AI at India
description: New Delhi [India], February 20: In a landmark moment for artificial intelligence and digital governance, Dr. Ravneet (Ravi) Singh, an American social media strategist and AI researcher based in Miami, Florida, returned to India this month to launch Magenta AI at the prestigious India-AI Impact Summit 2026 -- one of the world's largest gatherings of policymakers, innovators, and global tech leaders focused on shaping the future of artificial intelligence.
content:

title: AI can lift global growth, help India achieve Viksit Bharat goal, but poses high risk to jobs: IMF chief
description: New Delhi, Feb 20 (PTI) IMF Managing Director Kristalina Georgieva on Friday said artificial intelligence could lift global growth by 0.8 per cent and help India achieve the Viksit Bharat goal, but poses significant risk of displacement of jobs and financial stability. While being optimistic about the technology, Georgieva cautioned against “sugarcoating” the impact of […]
content:
She said AI creates potential for countries that go fast on digital infrastructure, skills, and adoption of AI, and countries must embrace the opportunities, while being mindful of the risks.
“I am very optimistic about AI. I’m also not naive, it bri... [3264 chars]

title: 6.1 Billion Gallons Of Water, 680,000 kWh Power A Day: Cost Of AI Prompts
description: OpenAI recently said users send around 2.5 billion prompts every day to its AI systems - a number that highlights the environmental footprint of our growing dependence on artificial intelligence.
content: What's in a prompt? More than you might think. As millions of people turn to artificial intelligence tools for everyday answers, the process often feels invisible - just a few keystrokes and a response appears. But behind every reply generated by sys... [2455 chars]

title: How Chinese artificial intelligence put a new spin on Winter Olympics action
description: Chinese tech firms have been using the Milano Cortina Games to showcase their capabilities to a global audience.

title: World shares, U.S. futures advance
description: European shares were higher Friday after a mixed day of trading in Asia, as worries over risks linked to massive investments in artificial intelligence and a potential U.S.-Iran conflict weighed on major benchmarks.
content:
BANGKOK — European shares were higher Friday after a mixed day of trading in Asia, as worries over risks linked to massive investments in artificial intelligence and a potential U.S.-Iran conflict weighed on major benchmarks.
